AIRTIGHT.Definition: completely closed so no air can come in

APOCALYPTIC.Definition: connected with the final destruction of the world

DUTY.Definition: something that you have to do

FIRSTHAND.Definition: if you experience something firsthand, you experience it for yourself

OVERCOME.Definition: if you are overcome by a feeling, you can't continue your normal life without thinking about it
